sentences.en: A plug had been inserted in the drill hole.
sentences.cn: 钻孔已塞上了塞子。

sentences.en: a plug-in graphics card
sentences.cn: 插入式图形卡

sentences.en: a power drill that plugs in.
sentences.cn: 插上电源的电钻

sentences.en: an electric plug
sentences.cn: 电源插头

sentences.en: Check that the plug has not come loose .
sentences.cn: 检查一下别让插头松脱了。

sentences.en: connoisseurs who are plugged into the current art scene.
sentences.cn: 与当前的艺术景观产生共鸣的鉴赏家

sentences.en: Crews are working to plug a major oil leak.
sentences.cn: 机组人员正在努力堵一个漏油的大洞。

sentences.en: I went down on one knee to plug in the vacuum cleaner.
sentences.cn: 我单腿跪下插上吸尘器插头.

sentences.en: I'll have to change the plug on my hairdryer.
sentences.cn: 我必须更换吹风机的插头。

sentences.en: It is possible to plug into remote databases to pick up information.
sentences.cn: 接入远程数据库来获取信息是可以办到的。

sentences.en: Make sure the draining board, sink and plug hole are regularly disinfected.
sentences.cn: 滴水板、水槽和塞孔一定要定期消毒。

sentences.en: The banks have the power to pull the plug on the project.
sentences.cn: 银行有能力让该工程终止。

sentences.en: the bath plug
sentences.cn: 浴缸塞子

sentences.en: The girl let her mother plug in the TV set.
sentences.cn: 女孩叫母亲插上电视机的插头.

sentences.en: The local system is plugged into the national telephone network. This computer plugs into a data bank.
sentences.cn: 这个地区性电话系统已与全国的电话网连接。这台计算机与资料库连线

sentences.en: The plug broke, exposing live wires.
sentences.cn: 插头坏了，带电的电线露在外面。

sentences.en: The plug on my iron needs changing.
sentences.cn: 我熨斗上的插头需要更换了。

sentences.en: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.cn: 墙上插座的电线短路烧断了保险丝，电灯跟着灭了。

sentences.en: They plug into the mains.
sentences.cn: 它们接到了干线上。

sentences.en: They used electricity from a plug in the garage.
sentences.cn: 他们通过车库插座取电.

sentences.en: Use this wad of cloth to plug the barrel.
sentences.cn: 用这软布把桶塞上.

sentences.en: We used mud to plug up the holes in the roof.
sentences.cn: 我们用泥堵住了房顶上的漏洞。

sentences.en: Wedge the plug into the hole.
sentences.cn: 将塞子塞进洞口。

words.tran_cn: （牙齿）填塞物；苦干的人；宣传员；广告播音员
堵塞；接通电源（plug的过去分词）
塞住；用插头将与电源接通

phrases.tran_cn: 预热塞，电热塞；热线点火塞
热型火花塞；热插拔；热点火塞；分隔式燃烧室下部带有通道的镶块
接通电源：通过连结电源插座上工作产生功能
&I{【俚语】} 使与…紧密协调，使与…产生共鸣
插座，插孔；电源插座，塞孔
（将插头插入插座以） 给…接通电源；接通电源
n. 火花塞；带头人；中坚分子

trans.tran_cn: 塞子，插头，消防栓，（内燃机的）火花塞
trans.tran_en: a round flat piece of rubber used for stopping the water flowing out of a bath or  sink
a round flat piece of rubber used for stopping the water flowing out of a bath or  sink

trans.tran_cn: 塞住；用插头将与电源接通
trans.tran_en: to fill or block a small hole

trans.tran_cn: 填塞，堵，〈俚〉勤苦工作，用功
以（塞子）塞住，插入，〈俚〉枪击，殴打
trans.tran_en: to fill or block a small hole
